name: AttachObjectToVehicle
notes: The object must be created first.
warnings: When the vehicle is destroyed or respawned, the attached objects won't be destroyed with it; they will remain stationary at the position the vehicle disappeared and be reattached to the next vehicle to claim the vehicle ID that the objects were attached to.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3c  and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Attach an object to a vehicle.
params_title: (objectid, vehicleid, Float:OffsetX, Float:OffsetY, Float:OffsetZ, Float:RotX, Float:RotY, Float:RotZ)

params_body.name: objectid
params_body.description: The ID of the object to attach to the vehicle. Note that this is an object ID, not a model ID. The object must be CreateObject created first.

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle to attach the object to.

params_body.name: Float:OffsetX
params_body.description: The X axis offset from the vehicle to attach the object to.

params_body.name: Float:OffsetY
params_body.description: The Y axis offset from the vehicle to attach the object to.

params_body.name: Float:OffsetZ
params_body.description: The Z axis offset from the vehicle to attach the object to.

params_body.name: Float:RotX
params_body.description: The X rotation offset for the object.

params_body.name: Float:RotY
params_body.description: The Y rotation offset for the object.

params_body.name: Float:RotZ
params_body.description: The Z rotation offset for the object.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
